actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to exclude certain amounts in the computation of the offset against benefits which is presently provided in the case of spouses and surviving spouses receiving government pensions.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to decrease the reduction in title II benefits required of spouses, surviving spouses, and mothers receiving Government pensions.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to exclude certain amounts in the computation of the offset against benefits which is presently provided in the case of spouses and surviving spouses receiving government pensions.
